name: Gijs Schoenmakers
content: My CMS | Assistant Professor at Maastricht University Department of Knowledge Engineering Skip to content My name is Gijs Schoenmakers. I am assistant professor at the Department of Data Science and Knowledge Engineering (DKE) at Maastricht University. Contact details: Email: gm.schoenmakers (at) maastrichtuniversity.nl Phone: +31 – 43 3882680 Postal address: P.O.Box 616, 6200MD Maastricht Visiting address: St. Servaasklooster 39, Office 1.002. 6211TE, Maastricht My main research topic is Game Theory. A list of my publications can be found under the button Research. I teach several courses for the BSc Data Science and Knowledge Engineering at DKE, for the MSc Data Science for Decision Making at DKE, as well as at UCM (University College Maastricht) and at MSP (Maastricht Science College). Most of the courses I teach are Game Theory courses, but I also teach courses in Probability Theory & Statistics, Stochastic Decision Making and Discrete Mathematics.
